name: Vader's Personal Shuttle (V)
Lore: 'Shuttle Customized transport of Lord Vader. Employs advanced sensor jamming gear. Modified with enhanced tactical displays constructed to the Dark Lord''s specifications.',
Text: 'May add 2 pilots and 4 passengers. Vader deploys -3 aboard. Whlie Vader piloting at a battleground, maneuver +2 and you lose no Force to Uncontrolable Fury or You Must Confront Vader.(Original concept by Nate Meeker - World Champion 2006)',
